en.title: Sports Eyewear and Goggles
en.subTitle: AI offers brands and retailers extensive lab testing and inspections for ski goggles, swimming goggles, and all other categories of protective and performance eyewear.
en.soloutionTitle: Eyewear Expertise – QC for Sports Eyewear and Goggles
en.soloutionContent:
Sports eyewear is a product category that covers various goggles and masks designed to protect the eyes and face during strenuous sporting and leisure activities, such as swimming, skiing, cycling, biking, and even skydiving. When choosing sports eyewear, consumers are looking for a combination of style and high performance: desired characteristics may include UV protection, resistance to impact, good peripheral field of vision, fog resistance, and more. A safety failure during the use of sports eyewear or goggles may result in serious injury, which makes strict quality control all the more important for this product category.

Under EU regulations (89/686/EEC), ski goggles, swimming goggles and other sports eyewear are classified as Personal Protection Equipment (PPE) in Category I or II, depending on the complexity of their design.

AI is uniquely equipped to test all categories of sports eyewear against international standards and manufacturer’s own specifications. Our dedicated inspector resources and HOKLAS accredited labs offer a wide range of tests and quality control procedures to help you ensure the quality, safety, and compliance of your sports goggles at every production stage and for all destination markets.

Dedicated Eyewear Testing Labs and Inspector Resources

AI product inspectors are dispatched to your supplier’s factory to conduct a thorough check of your sports eyewear before it’s shipped. Our inspection process is fast and reliable – we guarantee an inspector on-site within 48 hours, and you receive detailed inspection reports on the day of the inspection to make an informed decision for your supply chain.

On-site product inspections cover various aspects of your product’s workmanship and mechanical properties. For an in-depth analysis of the performance characteristics of your sports eyewear, we offer a wide range of tests at our HOKLAS certified laboratories.

Our tests for ski goggles, sports goggles, and other sports eyewear cover the requirements of such international standards as:

  • Europe:
    • BS 5883 – swimming goggles
    • EN 13178 – snow mobile goggles
    • EN 1938 – motorcycle goggles
  • USA:
    • ANSI Z80.31
    • ASTM F659 – ski goggles
    • ASTM F803-14 – sports goggles
    • ASTM F3077-14 – lacrosse goggles
    • ASTM F2713-14 – field hockey eye protectors
    • ASTM F2812-12 – motor sports goggles
  • Japan:
    • JIS 7301:1992 + A: 2009 – swimming goggles

HOKLAS Certified Lab Testing for Sports Eyewear and Goggles

Considering the variety of usage conditions, there are numerous quality and safety requirements applicable to sports eyewear and goggles. AI labs offer the largest available selection of sports eyewear tests against all relevant standards and regulations, for example:

  • Anti-fogging, for EN 174, ASTM F659, EN 1938, and EN 13178
  • Anti-reflection treated sun glare lenses, for EN 174 and EN 1836
  • Blue-light blocking, for EN 174
  • Corrosion resistance on metal parts, for EN 13178
  • Field of vision, for EN 174, EN 13178, and EN 1938
  • Impact resistance for motorcycle goggle, for EN 1938 (speed 45m/s or 60 m/s)
  • Lens surface quality or optical quality (defects), for EN 174, EN 13178, EN 1938, ASTM F659, ASTM F803, ASTM F3077, ASTM F2812, and ASTM F2713
  • Luminous transmittance and uniformity, for EN 174, EN 13178, EN 1938, ASTM F659, ASTM F803, ASTM F3077, ASTM F2812, and ASTM F2713
  • Mechanical strength and impact resistance, for EN 174 (temperatures down to -10 C), EN 13178 (temperatures down to -40 C), BS 5883
  • Nickel release on metal parts (refers to EN 12472 + EN 1811/EN 16128), for EN 1938
  • Optical powers and tolerances, for EN 174, EN 13178, EN 1938, ASTM F659, ASTM F803, ASTM F3077, ASTM F2812, and ASTM F2713
  • Polarized lens requirements, for EN 174, EN 1938, and ASTM F659
  • Prismatic difference, for EN 174, EN 13178, EN 1938, ASTM F659, ASTM F803, ASTM F3077, ASTM F2812, and ASTM F2713
  • Refractive properties, for BS 5883 and JIS 7301
  • Resistance to infrared radiation, for EN 174 (infrared absorption)
  • Resistance to snow and water, for EN 174 and ASTM F659
  • Resistance to surface damage, for EN 174, EN 1938, and EN 13178
  • Scattered light diffusion test, for EN 174, EN 13178, and EN 1938
  • Sit and Fit, ventilation and construction, for EN 174, EN 13178, EN 1938, and ASTM F659
  • Suitability for cleaning, for EN 174 and ASTM F659
  • Swimming goggles, for BS 5883 (including leakage test, compression test, water seal test, head strap slip resistance, bridge strap tensile strength, etc.)
  • UV/UVA/UVB blocking, for EN 174 and ASTM F659

Tailor-made testing programs can be prepared to suit your in-house specifications and the needs of your supply chain. Get in touch with us for an instant testing quote.

zh.title: 运动眼镜与护目镜
zh.subTitle: AI亚检为各大品牌和零售眼镜商提供专业的实验室测试和检验项目，测试对象包括滑雪护目镜、游泳镜及其他各种防护眼镜和特种眼镜。
zh.soloutionTitle: 眼镜类产品检测专家——运动眼镜及护目镜质量控制
zh.soloutionContent:
运动眼镜类目下涵盖多种护目镜和面罩，这些用具可在诸如游泳、滑雪、骑自行车甚至跳伞等激烈的运动和休闲活动中，保护运动者的眼睛和面部不受伤害。因此，在选择运动眼镜时，造型设计出众，并兼具防紫外线、抗冲击、大视野，以及防雾和更多功能的高性能产品更受消费者的青睐。在运动眼镜或护目镜的使用过程中出现的安全缺陷极有可能导致严重事故。因此，严格的质量控制对该类产品来说可谓是重中之重。

按照欧洲规范 (89/686/EEC)，滑雪护目镜、游泳镜及其他运动眼镜依据设计上的不同复杂程度被归类为一类或二类个人防护设备 (PPE)。

AI 亚检拥有检测先进装备，可按照国际标准或制造商的内部规范，对各种运动眼镜进行测试。我们拥有专业的检验团队和获得 HOKLAS 认证的测试实验室，可提供种类丰富的测试和质量控制程序，从而确保您的运动眼镜在每个生产阶段均能合格地达到质量和安全标准，并最终满足各个目标市场对产品的要求。

专业的眼镜类产品测试实验室和检验团队

在您的运动眼镜出厂装运前，AI亚检会将产品检验员派驻至您供应商的工厂，以便对货物进行全面彻底的检测。我们的检测过程既快速又可靠。我们保证，检验员在 48 小时内就到达现场，并且您在检验当天就可收到详细的检测报告，以便您对供应链做出明智而合理的决策。

现场产品检验涵盖产品工艺与机械特性等多方面内容。如需更深入的分析您运动眼镜的性能特性，我们获得 HOKLAS 认证的实验室可为您提供种类更为丰富的各类测试。

针对滑雪护目镜、运动护目镜和其他运动眼镜产品的测试涵盖以下国际标准要求：

  • 欧洲：
    • BS 5883 – 游泳镜
    • EN 13178 – 雪上摩托车护目镜
    • EN 1938 – 摩托车护目镜
  • 美国：
    • ANSI Z80.31
    • ASTM F659 – 滑雪护目镜
    • ASTM F803-14 – 运动护目镜
    • ASTM F3077-14 – 长曲棍球护目镜
    • ASTM F2713-14 – 曲棍球护目镜
    • ASTM F2812-12 – 赛车运动护目镜
  • Japan:
    • JIS 7301:1992 + A: 2009 – 游泳镜

HOKLAS 认证的运动眼镜及护目镜实验室测试

由于运动眼镜和护目镜的使用场景太过广泛，相应地，适用的质量和安全标准也极为众多。AI亚检实验室可按照所有相关标准和规范，为运动眼镜和护目镜提供种类最齐全的各种测试，例如：

  • 防雾，标准：EN 174、ASTM F659、EN 1938 及 EN 13178
  • 防反光处理的太阳眩光镜片，标准：EN 174 及 EN 1836
  • 防蓝光，标准：EN 174
  • 金属部件防腐蚀，标准：EN 13178
  • 视野，标准：EN 174、EN 13178 及 EN 1938
  • 摩托车护目镜抗冲击，标准：EN 1938（速度：45m/s 或 60 m/s）
  • 镜片表面质量或光学质量（瑕疵），标准：EN 174、EN 13178、EN 1938、ASTM F659、ASTM F803、ASTM F3077、ASTM F2812 及 ASTM F2713
  • 光透射率与均匀性，标准：EN 174、EN 13178、EN 1938、ASTM F659、ASTM F803、ASTM F3077、ASTM F2812 及 ASTM F2713
  • 机械强度及抗冲击，标准：EN 174（温度低至 -10 ℃）、EN 13178（温度低至 -40 ℃）、BS 5883
  • 金属部件镍释出量（引用 EN 12472 + EN 1811/EN 16128），标准：EN 1938
  • 光学度数及公差，标准：EN 174、EN 13178、EN 1938、ASTM F659、ASTM F803、ASTM F3077、ASTM F2812 及 ASTM F2713
  • 偏光镜片要求，标准：EN 174、EN 1938 及 ASTM F659
  • 棱镜差异，标准：EN 174、EN 13178、EN 1938、ASTM F659、ASTM F803、ASTM F3077、ASTM F2812 及 ASTM F2713
  • 折射性能，标准：BS 5883 及 JIS 7301
  • 抗红外辐射，标准：EN 174（红外吸收）
  • 防雪防水，标准：EN 174 及 ASTM F659
  • 防表面损伤，标准：EN 174、EN 1938 及 EN 13178
  • 散射光漫射测试，标准：EN 174、EN 13178 及 EN 1938
  • 安放及佩戴、通风与结构，标准：EN 174、EN 13178、EN 1938 及 ASTM F659
  • 适合清洗性，标准：EN 174 及 ASTM F659
  • 游泳镜，标准：BS 5883（包括泄露测试、耐压测试、水密封测试、头带防滑移、镜带拉伸强度等）
  • 防 UV/UVA/UVB，标准：EN 174 及 ASTM F659
